news.title: Fugees’ Pras Michel Sentenced to 14 Years in Prison on Conspiracy Charges
news.summary: The rapper was found guilty of criminal conspiracy and illegal foreign lobbying in 2023

news.title: Skrillex Drops New Hit Me Where It Hurts X EP: Listen
news.summary: The surprise five-track project features Caroline Polachek, Varg2™, 100 gecs’ Dylan Brady, and others

news.title: Tems Surprise-Releases New EP Love Is a Kingdom: Listen
news.summary: The Nigerian artist follows last year’s Born in the Wild with a new seven-song project

news.title: Watch Geese Play Getting Killed Songs on Nigel Godrich’s From the Basement
news.summary: The New York band are the first act to play the iconic live-in-studio music series in nearly three years
